example.eg: Three-player chess is a variation of chess in which three people play against each other.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 变异, 变种, 变体

example.eg: The graph shows the variation in temperature throughout the day.
Over the years there has been a lot of variation within the organization.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 变化量, 变动的程度

example.eg: The statistics show a variation from the norm.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 变差, 差别, 差异

example.eg: The composer wrote a variation on a theme by Mozart.
